GSP28mjnya02u:1309: tamanūdya paryagnikṛtaśabdānvitena 'utsṛjanti' ityākhyātena paryagnikaraṇākhyo guṇo vidhīyate
GSP28mjnya02u:1310: na ca prakṛtimatasya paryagnikaraṇasya vikṛtau codakena prāptatvādanarthako 'yaṃ vidhiridhivācyam
GSP28mjnya02u:1315: paryagnikaraṇavākye svārtho bidhistyajyeta, anyārthe niṣedhaḥ svī kriyeta,
GSP28mjnya02u:1320: codakapravṛtteḥ prāgevāyaṃ vidhiḥ pravartate, pratyakṣopadeśasya śīghrabuddhijanakatayā kalpyātideśātprabalatvāt
GSP28mjnya02u:1322: na cānena nyāyena paryagnikaraṇātprācīnānāmapya prāptiriti vācyam |
GSP28mjnya02u:1323: vidhīyamānasya paryāgnikaraṇasya nūtanatve satyupakārakalpanāpattyā prakṛtau yatkḷptopakāraṃ paryagnikaraṇaṃ, tadavasthāpannasyaivātra vidheyatvāt |
GSP28mjnya02u:1324: prakṛtau ca prācīnāṅganantaramādina evopakāraḥ kḷpta ityatrāpi tādṛśasyaiva vidhānātparyāgnikaraṇāntāṅgarītiḥ sidhyati |
GSP28mjnya02u:1325: evaṃ ca sati 'utsṛjanti' ityākhyātena yathoktaparyagnikaraṇavidhāvarthasiddha uparitanāṅgotsargo
GSP28mjnya02u:1332: tadyāgo vā guṇo yāgaḥ syādadābhyāṃśunāmataḥ // MJaiNy_2,3.22 //
GSP28mjnya02u:1335: amārabhya śrūyate - 'eṣa vai ddaviṣā haviryajate, yo 'dābhyaṃ gṛhītvā somāya yajate' iti 'parā vā etasyā'yuḥ prāṇa eti, yoṃ'śuṃ gṛhṇāti' iti ca |
GSP28mjnya02u:1340: grahaṇaliṅgena jyotiṣṭomavikṛtitvādagatau tadīyavidhyantātideśena tatsiddheḥ - iti prāpte, brūmaḥ- bhavatvadābhyāṃśuśabdayornāmatvam |
GSP28mjnya02u:1341: te ca nāmanī grahayoreva syātām, na tu yāgayoḥ |
GSP28mjnya02u:1346: grahaṇaṃ ca jyotiṣṭomagatasya somarasasya saṃskārarūpo guṇaḥ,
GSP28mjnya02u:1348: yadyapyatra na prakṛto jyotiṣṭhomaḥ, tathāpi tatsaṃbandhigrahaṇadvārā vākyasya jyotiṣṭobhagāmitvam
GSP28mjnya02u:1350: athavā-taittirīyāṇāṃ ṣaṣṭhakāṇḍe ṣaṣṭhe prapāṭhake prākaraṇikaṃ viniyojakaṃ vākyaṃ draṣṭavyam
GSP28mjnya02u:1355: tatsaṃyogāt kratus tadākhyaḥ syāt tena dharmavidhānāni /
GSP28mjnya02u:1358: agniṃ cinuta ityatra yāgo vā saṃskṛtiyaṃjiḥ /
GSP28mjnya02u:1362: 'ya evaṃ vidvānagniṃ cinute' ityevaṃ vidhāya śrūyate-'athāto
GSP28mjnya02u:1366: tacca liṅgamevaṃ śrūyate-'agneḥ stotraṃ,agneḥ śastram' iti, 'ṣaḍupasado
GSP28mjnya02u:1368: yadi liṅgaṃ prāpakāpekṣam, tarhi yajinā tadanuvādaḥ prāpake 'stu |
GSP28mjnya02u:1369: agnimagniṣṭomenānuyajati' ityatesminvākye 'agniṃ yajati' iti yajisāmānādhikaraṇyāt 'upāṃśu yajati' itivadyāganāmatvam |
GSP28mjnya02u:1373: tasmāt 'agniṃ cinute' ityatrāgnināmako yāga ākhyātena vidhīyate |
GSP28mjnya02u:1410: kā tarhi nityāgnihotre guṇavidhiśaṅkā - iti cet |
GSP28mjnya02u:1413: tathā sati svataḥsiddhaṃ prakaraṇabhedaṃ nirākṛtya prakaraṇaikyāpādanena guṇaṃ vidhāpayituṃ pravṛttasyāgnihotraśabdasya śaktau nirūddhāyāṃ tadavasthaḥ prakaraṇabhedo nityāgnihotrādidaṃ karma bhinatti |
GSP28mjnya02u:1416: tato vājinanyāyena guṇabhedātkarmabhedaḥ, na prakaraṇabhedāditi cet |
GSP28mjnya02u:1421: paramārthatastvatra prathamatarapratītena prakaraṇabhedena siddhaṃ karmabhedaṃ guṇabheda upodbalayati
GSP28mjnya02u:1449: na cātra vājinanyāyena karmabhedaḥ, aṣṭākapāladravyāgnidevatātmano rūpasyobhayatraikavidhatvāt
GSP28mjnya02u:1460: saṃnidhau tv avibhāgāt phalārthena punaḥ śrutiḥ /
GSP28mjnya02u:1473: sa ca darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇe samāmnātaḥ-'śeṣaṃ sviṣṭakṛte samavadyati'
GSP28mjnya02u:1480: 'samidho yajati' ityādivadabhyāsādeva karmabhedaḥ - iti prāpte, brūmaḥ-
GSP28mjnya02u:1481: deśādīnāmavidheyatve 'pi vihitakarmaṇā saha teṣāṃ saṃbandho vidhīyatām |
GSP28mjnya02u:1482: sa ca karmavatpūrve na vihita ityaprāptatvādvidhimarhati |
GSP28mjnya02u:1486: ananuṣṭhitasyānuṣṭhānamupādānama, tacca karmāviṣayaḥ puruṣavyāpāraḥ' iti mahānbhedaḥ |
GSP28mjnya02u:1487: yo 'pi-darśādīnāṃ punarvidhiḥ so 'pi deśādisaṃbandhaṃ vidhātuṃ karmānuvādaḥ - iti na karmabhedamāvahati
GSP28mjnya02u:1488: samidho 'yajati' ityādau vidheyaguṇāntarābhāvenānuvādāṃsabhavātpunarvidhānaṃ bhedahotuḥ- iti vaiṣamyam || MJaiNyC_2,3.30-32 ||
GSP28mjnya02u:1491: avibhāgāt tu karmaṇāṃ dvirukter na vidhīyate /
GSP28mjnya02u:1503: tathā satyāgneyayāgasya darśakāle dviḥprayogaḥ- iti cet |
GSP28mjnya02u:1514: iti śrīmādhavīye jaiminīyanyāyamālavistare dvitīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ
GSP28mjnya02u:1519: liṅgadarśanāc ca karmadharme hi prakrameṇa niyamyeta tatrānarthakam anyat syāt /
GSP28mjnya02u:1520: apavarge ca darśayati kālaś cet karmabhedaḥ syāt /
GSP28mjnya02u:1523: kartus tu niyamāt kālaśāstraṃ nimittaṃ syāt /
GSP28mjnya02u:1526: yāvajjīvaṃ juhotīti dharmaḥ karmaṇi puṃsi vā /
GSP28mjnya02u:1534: tathā satyasya vākyasya nityaprayogavidhāyakatvābhāvena vākyāntaravihitaḥ kāmyaprayoga eka evāgnihotrasya paryavasyati |
GSP28mjnya02u:1540: yāvajjīvaśabdo na kālasya vācakaḥ, kiṃtu lakṣakaḥ |
GSP28mjnya02u:1572: liṅgamaviśiṣṭaṃ sarvaśeṣatvān na hi tatra karmacodanā tasmād dvādaśāhasyāhāravyapadeśaḥ syāt
GSP28mjnya02u:1573: dravye cācoditatvād vidhīnām avyavasthā syān nirdeśād vyatiṣṭheta tasmān nityānuvādaḥ syāt
GSP28mjnya02u:1579: api vā kramasaṃyogād vidhipṛthaktvam ekasyāṃ vyavatiṣṭheta /
GSP28mjnya02u:1580: virodhinā tv asaṃyogād aikakarmye tatsaṃyogād vidhīnāṃ sarvakarmapratyayaḥ syāt /
GSP28mjnya02u:1584: dṛṣṭaṃ kāṭhakanāmādi bahu bhedasya kāraṇam // MJaiNy_2,4.3 //
GSP28mjnya02u:1594: ekasyāṃ śākhāyāmadhītāḥ 'iṣe tvā' ityādayo mantrāḥ, palāśaśākhācchedādayaḥ
GSP28mjnya02u:1597: na hyalpāyuvā manuṣyeṇa sarvaśākhādhyayanapūrvakaṃ karmānuṣṭhānaṃ kartu śakyam |
GSP28mjnya02u:1614: iti śrīmādhavīye jaiminīyanyāyamālāvistare dvitīyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ dvitīyo 'dhyāyasya
